BM25BooleanWeight - Class in org.ninit.models.bm25
Weight BM25 class, implements public Scorer scorer(IndexReader reader) throws IOException
and public Explanation explain(IndexReader reader, int doc) throws IOException
Query weight is not used in this BM25 implementation.

L

lengthNorm(String, int) - Method in class org.ninit.models.bm25.BM25Similarity
 
load(String) - Static method in class org.ninit.models.bm25.BM25Parameters
Load field average length from a file with the next format:
FIELD_NAME
FLOAT_VALUE
ANOTHER_FIELD_NAME
ANOTHER_FIELD_VALUE
for example:
CONTENT
459.2903f
ANCHOR
84.55523f
load(String) - Static method in class org.ninit.models.bm25f.BM25FParameters
Load field average length from a file and set idfField value, the file must have the next format:
FIELD_NAME
FLOAT_VALUE
ANOTHER_FIELD_NAME
ANOTHER_FIELD_VALUE
for example:
CONTENT
459.2903f
ANCHOR
84.55523f
